metadata.title: CVE-2024-47554 commons-io
metadata.description: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption vulnerability in Apache Commons IO.  The org.apache.commons.io.input.XmlStreamReader class may excessively consume CPU resources when processing maliciously crafted input.   This issue affects Apache Commons IO: from 2.0 before 2.14.0.  Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.14.0 or later, which fixes the issue.
